markdown.markdown:
::: {.hero-section} ::: {.hero-content} üëã Data Scientist & ML Engineer

14 production-grade data science projects spanning exploratory analysis, machine learning, optimization, and statistical process control. Real implementations. Real results.

::: {.hero-stats} ::: {.stat-item} 14 Projects ::: ::: {.stat-item} 100% Open Source ::: ::: ::: {.hero-cta} Explore All Projects View Tech Stack ::: ::: ::: --- ## Featured Foundational Projects {.section-title} ::: {.project-grid} ::: {.project-card} ::: {.card-tags} Foundational EDA Pandas Seaborn ::: ### Industrial Sensor Data Analysis Deep-dive exploratory analysis of 16-channel gas sensor array with 65k+ timestamped readings. Identified cross-sensor correlations using heatmaps, quantified temporal drift with rolling statistics, and segmented response patterns by gas type. ::: {.card-metrics} 65k+ readings 16 sensors 5 gases ::: View Analysis ‚Üí ::: ::: {.project-card} ::: {.card-tags} Foundational Time Series ML Gradient Boosting ::: ### Energy Consumption Forecasting Built and compared three forecasting models (Ridge, RF, GB) on 10-minute resolution energy data. Engineered temporal features, lag features (1h-1d), and rolling statistics. GB achieved R¬≤ 0.85+ with residual analysis. ::: {.card-metrics} 20k samples R¬≤ 0.85+ 10min freq ::: View Analysis ‚Üí ::: ::: {.project-card} ::: {.card-tags} Foundational ML Isolation Forest PCA ::: ### Multivariate Anomaly Detection Implemented three strategies (Z-Score, Isolation Forest, PCA reconstruction) on 5-channel sensor streams. Detected point, contextual, and collective anomalies with 90%+ recall. Ensemble recommended for production. ::: {.card-metrics} 3 methods 90%+ recall 5 channels ::: View Analysis ‚Üí ::: ::: --- ## Featured Advanced Projects {.section-title} ::: {.project-grid} ::: {.project-card} ::: {.card-tags} Advanced EDA Transfer Entropy Wavelets ::: ### Advanced Sensor Data Analysis Extended analysis with transfer entropy for causal inference between sensor pairs, wavelet decomposition for multi-scale temporal patterns, and dynamic time warping for pattern matching. Sophisticated signal processing beyond basic EDA. ::: {.card-metrics} Transfer Entropy Wavelets DTW ::: View Analysis ‚Üí ::: ::: {.project-card} ::: {.card-tags} Advanced Time Series Deep Learning LSTM ::: ### Advanced Time Series Forecasting Deep learning approaches with LSTM/GRU networks for sequence-to-sequence prediction. Compared with Prophet for automated seasonality detection. Feature engineering with Fourier transforms and external regressors. ::: {.card-metrics} LSTM Prophet Seq2Seq ::: View Analysis ‚Üí ::: ::: {.project-card} ::: {.card-tags} Advanced Deep Learning VAE LSTM-AE ::: ### Advanced Anomaly Detection Deep learning anomaly detection with Variational Autoencoders (VAE) and LSTM-Autoencoders for temporal anomalies. Comparison with classical methods. Bayesian approaches for uncertainty quantification in anomaly scores. ::: {.card-metrics} VAE LSTM-AE Bayesian ::: View Analysis ‚Üí ::: ::: ::: {.view-all-section} View All 14 Projects ::: --- ## Tech Stack & Tools {#tech-stack .section-title} ::: {.stack-container} ::: {.stack-category}
